afest.datastructures.tree.decision.interfaces

Interface IPoint<R extends java.io.Serializable>

  • Type Parameters:
    R - Type used to identify features.
    All Superinterfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    ITrainingPoint<R,T>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ERTMemoryLessPoint, ERTMemoryLessTrainingPoint, ERTPoint, ERTTrainingPoint

    public interface IPoint<R extends java.io.Serializable>
extends java.io.Serializable
    Interface implementing a point used by the Extremely Randomized Trees.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      R[] getAttributes()
      Return the attributes contained in the Point.
      double getValue(R attribute)
      Return the value of the given feature.
      int size()
      Return the number of features contained in the Point.
